content: **Luojia Fragrant Vines** are an item in Black Myth: Wukong that you can collect to increase the number of times you can use your Gourd before needing to refill it. More Gourd uses means more health in Black Myth: Wukong, so you will want to get your hands on each and every one of these vines.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations'.
The content is as follows:
**Luojia Fragrant Vines** are an item in Black Myth: Wukong that you can collect to increase the number of times you can use your Gourd before needing to refill it. More Gourd uses means more health in Black Myth: Wukong, so you will want to get your hands on each and every one of these vines.
